name: River Road
description: A quiet stretch of River Road, where the asphalt meets the encroaching weeds. You are on River Road, a ribbon of cracked asphalt that seems to be losing its battle with the persistent flora. To the west, the familiar, if slightly worn, suburban sprawl of Hubbard Avenue beckons. The air here carries the faint scent of damp earth and forgotten dreams, a testament to nature's slow, inevitable reclamation. The occasional rustle in the overgrown bushes hints at unseen wildlife, or perhaps just the wind playing tricks. At a glance: A quiet, slightly neglected stretch of River Road.
